website_summaries.verdict: A voice amplifier that's fun to look at and use. Plus, it blocks out most background noise.
pros: Create professional presentations or karaoke events in mere moments
Easily connects to most digital devices including MP3s
Projects over the sounds of loud children and works well as a speaker
cons: Some feedback may occur when using the microphone

customer_reviews.title: Mean Green Speaking Machine
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for voice amplification, not singing. It seems to be plenty loud, but there is a bit of distortion at the high end of the volume. I would not use this for singing in public due to the distortion factor, but for kids goofing around with karaoke singing at home, it's fine. I chose this one over the more expensive amps because it's LIGHTWEIGHT. I will wear this around my neck, across my body, or maybe clipped in a pants pocket. It's much better to wear 4 oz. around you neck than almost 1 lb. These little amps are great when you work outdoors and have to talk to crowds. They really save your vocal chords.
customer_reviews.author: Area Woman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for needing to be a little louder.
customer_reviews.text: this worked awesome! I brought it to the daycare and let the kids use it for their singing contest! They all had a ball and it sounded great. For a small ampilifer it definitely worked better than I could have even hoped for. this was a great buy and when or if it ever dies I know i will have to buy another one because it is a must have! It also was very well made. It was boxed perfect and Honestly Im not sure if I could find a negative thing to say.
customer_reviews.author: Nancee

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This a was a gift for a teacher who kept losing her voice talking to her class. This has helped alot jn her maintaining her voice throughout the day now.
customer_reviews.author: Conrad M Carrette

customer_reviews.title: Sound
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for a friend (senior citizen) who has trouble speaking in a voice loud enough for others to hear. It works well. Setup was easy. With the clip being used it is hands free for her. This helps her to be heard on the phone too. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amy B

customer_reviews.title: Does what it’s suppose to!
customer_reviews.text: This voice amplifier is hella good. Your voice comes out loud and clear. Some feedback if the volume is too high but that’s ok. I would recommend this for people who don’t want to talk super loud.
customer_reviews.author: KaL

customer_reviews.title: Small but loud
customer_reviews.text: I used this to read a book to around 20 squirming kids and everyone said they could hear me loud and clear and I saved my voice.
customer_reviews.author: Amy W.

customer_reviews.title: My wife does Korean Folk dancing. She wears colorful ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife does Korean Folk dancing. She wears colorful outfits. This Voice Amplifier is colorful but works well, especial for the price. It allows her to talk to a large group without having to shout. I don’t think I would use it for a formal meeting, but for the kids or for a novelty it is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Loud and Clear!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! My 81 yr old mother has difficulty hearing and understanding, but with this amplifier, she can hear me loud and clear. Good product at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie S.

customer_reviews.title: Works Well, Just Adjust to Avoid Feedback Noise
customer_reviews.text: Amplified my voice and worked great as the key part of my “announcer” costume. Might have to mess with the dials so it doesn’t accidentally give you that feedback/static noise.
customer_reviews.author: B. Wang

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is not great. Feedback is awful. Once you get past those problems, it works OK.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Great for teachers
customer_reviews.text: I teach second grade and purchased this because I was tired of losing my voice... It does a great job amplifying my voice and is small enough to not be in the way.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Y

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very good, works great. Arrived quickly & fully charged, ready to use. Worked well for an outdoor performance in an active urban setting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for teachers
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality! I use this to teach elementary students and it’s easy to wear, they hear well, and I’m surprised by the low price. Just got it a few days ago, so I hope it stays in good shape!
customer_reviews.author: Hello!

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I use it every day to teach music classes. A lifesaver for my voice!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Great sound. I like the fact that there can be mudic playing while you are talking.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Sparling

customer_reviews.title: Good for classroom
customer_reviews.text: Cute, wish it came with lapel clip Instead of headset. Works great in the classroom for the money
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Lift up your voice
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to amplify my voice for introductions at our class reunion. It was great!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Hill

customer_reviews.title: not working
customer_reviews.text: I can't get it to amplify or work. The instructions are nearly non existent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Crap does not work and has no cord adapter to plug in buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Dake

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids to play singing
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my niece on Christmas and she loves it, she walks afound the house singing (we had to set max limits on the volume) and it last long enough for a full day before you USB charge it again .. good quality construction including the head-piece - will recommend it
customer_reviews.author: E. Shortt

product_meta.title: Voice Amplifier, MAONO AU-C03 Mini Rechargeable PA system (1020mAh) with Wired Microphone for Teachers, Presentations, Coaches, Tour Guides, Market Promotion (Green)
feature_bullets: 【Never Be Unheard Again】The updated version-MAONO AU-C03 Voice Amplifier has outstanding amplification function. The unidirectional(cardioid) microphone collects only the voice from your mouse without picking up any background sound while the dual voice coil 360 stereo speaker amplifies your voice more natural and real

【USB to Micro USB Charging】Unlike other old-school voice amplifier which requires a unique charging adaptor, MAONO VP is using micro USB port, so you can just use your mobile charger and cable to charge it, no need to worry about losing your PA’s adapter

【Pocket Design But Powerful】Reduce your weight burden: It is only 3.1 x 1.8 x 3.4 inches and 127g (lighter than iPhone 6). It’s Mono loudness up to 126dB. The Sound covers over about 400㎡. Lightweight and powerful make your presentations more successfully
【Long Working Time】 The inbuilt battery of 1020 mA provides a 10-hour working time, If use it for 3 hours per day, you can use it about 1 week after 3 hours full recharge

【MP3 and Music Player】Support TF card and AUX line-in to play music with the 3.5mm male to male Aux cable, easily turn this voice amplifier into a music speaker, it can even play music while you input the microphone, and it becomes a mini karaoke system

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars37 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
